name: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust
description: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on owning and operating upscale, full-service hotels in urban markets and leisure destinations. Founded in 2009, the company aims to enhance the value of its properties through innovative management strategies and exceptional guest experiences. Pebblebrook's portfolio includes a diverse range of properties, primarily located in key metropolitan areas across the United States, catering to both business and leisure travelers. The company emphasizes sustainability and community engagement, striving to implement eco-friendly practices in hotel operations and contribute positively to the local economies where it operates. Through strategic acquisitions and a commitment to quality service, Pebblebrook seeks to deliver strong returns for its shareholders while maintaining high standards of hospitality.
